name: Botkit-template-for-heroku-slack-teneo
description: A Slack Bot powered by Teneo. Uses Botkit and Heroku

token.description: Please input your Slack bot token

engine_host.description: Please input your Teneo Engine Host. No http or http just the host name.

engine_path.description: Please input your Teneo Engine Path.

engine_par.description: Optional - Any additional Teneo Engine parameters. i.e. &firstName=Peter&lastName=Joles
